subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3245 is on the way
description_text:
Good evening,
I received my order on 11/17/2025, but my pedal control box is missing from the package. Please let me know how soon this matter can be resolved?


Best regards, Kyle Asquith B.S. Integrative Neuroscience Pronouns: He/Him/His

On Thursday, November 6, 2025, 3:36 AM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi Kyle Asquith,    We apologize for the delayed response. We will reship your order after our U.S. warehouse reopens following the Thanksgiving holiday.
Hi Kyle Asquith,    I note you've placed an order for the Pro X Ultra. Might I ask whether you still require the Plus X control box?
yes, I still require it Sincerely, Kyle
Hi Kyle Asquith,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see the package has been delivered.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047080365792
